backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, posts, social interactions, and access-control‑gated CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping branding‑related features to affected frontend files and component versions.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base definitions with light/dark theme variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry document setting metadata and loading the React app with the Josh title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router routes and wrapping content in layout, theming, and toaster providers.
Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthRequire: Wrapper that restricts child UI to authenticated users or shows a sign‑in prompt.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog for first‑time profile creation with form fields and backend save integration.
frontend/src/components/empty/EmptyFeedS: Empty feed UI showing illustration and calls to action for creating posts or exploring users.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedList.ts: Renders a list of PostCards with loading handling and optional pagination load‑more button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, navigation, and profile setup dialog wrapping page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Renders desktop navigation buttons with routing and auth-based visibility.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomTab: Provides mobile bottom navigation with auth checks and active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostAction: Displays like, repost, and reply actions for a post with auth gating and mutation handlers.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Shows a post with author info, timestamp, content, and actions, linking to profile and post pages.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCompos: Form for creating posts or replies with validation, character limits, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowBu: Follow/unfollow button using mutations and auth checks, reflecting current follow state.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileH: Displays a user’s profile header with avatar, bio, stats, and a follow button when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchRes: Renders search results for users and posts with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value updated after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity status handling. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options and exposes a hook for accessing identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, posts, feeds, and social interactions via an actor. Provides structured query keys and invalidates caches on mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and global styles. Includes base styling, safe-area padding support, and utility layers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app by mounting it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Imports global styles and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/ComposePage.tsx: Page for creating new posts, requiring user identity and using PostComposer. Redirects to home after successful post creation.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Explore page supporting search across users and posts with debouncing and fallback to recent feed. Uses tabs to switch between search result types.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home feed page showing public or personalized posts with pagination. Displays an empty state when no posts are available.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Shows a single post with loading states, reply composer, and filtered replies. Fetches full feed to derive replies client‑side.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user profile and their posts, with loading and not‑found states. Filters posts by author to build the profile feed.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters. Supports hash-based routing and persistence via sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom color palette via CSS variables, extended theme options, and typography/container-query/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current app state, issues, required images, and a list of existing implemented features for a Threads-like app.
